QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_visual_widget_config.id odf_pk, odf_visual_widget_config.UI_COLUMN as ui_column, odf_visual_widget_config.CODE as code, odf_visual_widget_config.WIDGET_ID as widget_id, odf_visual_widget_config.UI_ROW as ui_row, odf_visual_widget_config.PARENT_ID as parent_id, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, ODF_VISUAL_WIDGET_CONFIG.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_odf_vis_widget_conf.partition_code as partition_code, ODF_VISUAL_WIDGET_CONFIG.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, odf_visual_widget_config.PARENT_OBJECT_CODE as parent_object_code, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by from odf_visual_widget_config odf_visual_widget_config, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_odf_vis_widget_conf odf_ca_odf_vis_widget_conf where 1 = 1 and odf_visual_widget_config.created_by = CREATED.user_id and odf_visual_widget_config.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and odf_visual_widget_config.id = odf_ca_odf_vis_widget_conf.id
